## FIREBASE\_CONFIG\_VAR variable

Constant holding the environment variable name with the default config. If the environment variable contains a string that starts with '<!-- -->{<!-- -->' it will be parsed as JSON, otherwise it will be assumed to be pointing to a file.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
FIREBASE_CONFIG_VAR = "FIREBASE_CONFIG"
```
